meanings.definition: A soft and delicate shade of color
meanings.sent1: The sky at sunset was painted in beautiful pastels.
meanings.sent2: She decorated her room with pastels to create a calming atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The flowers in the garden bloomed in lovely pastels, making the bees jealous.
meanings.sent4: The pastels of the sunrise painted the horizon with a gentle touch.
meanings.sent5: The artist used pastels to bring life to the landscape painting.

meanings.definition: A type of crayon made from powdered pigments and a binder
meanings.sent1: The children used pastels to draw colorful pictures in art class.
meanings.sent2: She bought a set of pastels to create vibrant artwork.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat mistook the pastels for treats and left colorful paw prints everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The pastels glided smoothly on the paper, creating a rainbow of hues.
meanings.sent5: The artist's fingers were stained with the vibrant colors of the pastels.

meanings.definition: A work of art created using pastels as a medium
meanings.sent1: The exhibition featured stunning pastels of landscapes and portraits.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours working on a pastel of her favorite flower.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel snuck into the artist's studio and added nuts to the pastel, creating a unique masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her pastel of the ocean seemed to come alive with the crashing waves.
meanings.sent5: The pastel captured the essence of the cityscape with its vibrant colors.
